meanings.sent1: This shirt is the cheapest one in the store.
meanings.sent2: She always looks for the cheapest option when shopping.
meanings.sent3: The cheapest pencil in the pack was so tiny, it looked like a toothpick.
meanings.sent4: His idea was the cheapest solution to the problem.
meanings.sent5: The cheapest candy tasted like sweet cardboard.

meanings.sent1: The cheapest store in town always has a sale.
meanings.sent2: The company became popular for its cheapest products.
meanings.sent3: The cheapest restaurant in the area served meals on tiny plates to save money.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the cheapest way to brighten someone's day.
meanings.sent5: The cheapest haircut left his hair looking like a mess.

meanings.sent1: That store always has the cheapest items on sale.
meanings.sent2: The hotel offered the cheapest room for the night.
meanings.sent3: The cheapest toy in the box was missing an arm, making it a one-armed superhero.
meanings.sent4: His words were the cheapest form of comfort during tough times.
meanings.sent5: The cheapest ticket to the concert had an obstructed view of the stage.
